original_title: 圍繞整個小部件的人! 個人資訊懸崖偶像 "驚人的算命經驗報告, 提前獲得了使用星座100% 中級和洗腦! 假通靈的空話相信性騷擾豐富! 性愛最後一定是!
overview: Gadgets All Around Me ! I Tricked An Idol Whose Career Is On The Rocks Into Thinking That It Was "A Report On A Fortuneteller Who Gives Eerily Accurate Readings", And Brainwashed Her By Giving A 100% Accurate Reading Using Her Personal Information I Collected In Advance. I Sexually Molested The Idol Who Completely Believed The Words Of The Fortuneteller! We Even Ended Up Having Sex!
title: Gadgets All Around Me! - We Tricked An Idol During An Hypnosis TV Show Contracting An AV Actress To Pretend To Be Hypnotized 03
